product_name: Scott MTB Pro Lady Bike Shoes - Women's
long_description: The Scott MTB Pro Lady Bike Shoes for ambitious female XC riders offer an optimal balance of power transmission and grip off the bike via a high-traction outsole. Because the Scott outsole construction minimizes the distance to the pedal, your power is transferred directly to the pedals to maximize your output. Synthetic leather uppers wrap the foot like a second skin and are free of pressure points; women-specific instep and heel counter hold feet securely and comfortably. Closure system of 2 straps and 1 buckle fine-tunes the fit. 2-component polyurethane X-Traction outsole gives you great traction while off-bike. Scott MTB Pro Lady Bike Shoes are engineered to support active, performance-driven athletes.
short_description: The Scott MTB Pro Lady Bike Shoes for ambitious female XC riders offer an optimal balance of power transmission and grip off the bike via a high-traction outsole.
